website_summaries.verdict: Choose it if you are looking for a tough RC helicopter with a small build.
pros: A popular model with small but sturdy build that makes it suitable for indoor flying
Good choice for kids or beginners
Has one-key landing for a smooth descent every time
We love its bright red details
cons: Some complained that the short battery life is frustrating for children

customer_reviews.title: Even being so small it packs a punch!
customer_reviews.text: I have a larger version of this same helicopter (Which I love) so I decided to get a smaller one to see how it would handle and I gotta say that the quality and control translates perfectly to this one! It is a lot quieter than the bigger one (Which my wife appreciates) and the controls are some how easier than the other for some reason. I really enjoy flying this helicopter! I keep running it into walls (By mistake of course) and it takes the hits like a champ!
customer_reviews.author: Son Goku

customer_reviews.title: Super cool design!
customer_reviews.text: This helicopter is very very stable! It has automatic landing and automatic take off, super easy to fly and play with the cats! My blind cat loves it, as soon as he hears the remote control he starts searching fro where the sound and wind comes from, I fly it around plants without touching them, it is great for beginners and very fun for the experienced ones too, it has great led light too, it charges in only 1 hour and the fying time is about 8 minutes
customer_reviews.author: MediaBoxEnt

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Fly
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box this helicopter is fully assembled. The only thing needed to fly is a quick charge (less than an hour for me). There is one glitch in the instruction booklet however, it states that the on/off switch is on top of the helicopter. I scoured the top unable to find the switch. The switch is on the right side of the helicopter opposite the charging input. The S107H is very easy to fly, it hovers in one position when not touching the controls. It flies great indoors, but outdoors, it is pretty iffy. The slightest wind can carry it away if you are not careful. With a little practice, you can land it on a book.
customer_reviews.author: Odojoe

customer_reviews.title: A truly amazing value!
customer_reviews.text: Update.. broke after only 6 flights.. did not crash. Battery seems to have gone bad... Wow, there is so much to like. The first impression is the build quality of the helicopter, it has metal parts and high quality plastic. My so guessed the cost at 130 dollars. Very easy to fly, the blade design is amazing, if the blade hits something it just folds back. You are going to love this.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: Up, Up and away! Great chopper!
customer_reviews.text: This helicopter is really sturdy. Packaged very well and is easy to operate if you follow the instructions. Looks good and functions great. Perfect give for a new or young pilot! It flies so easily. with the automatic launch and landing, makes it easy enough for my 4 year old to fly. Perfect indoor flier, took it outside a few times and it is just to light to withstand any type of breeze. I have used small helicopters before and some were expensive (brookstone), but this the best by far. Thinking of getting two more for the kids and I to race. Battery life is short compared to charge time. 5 mins/1 hour. Otherwise, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jay D.

customer_reviews.title: Super Fun Little Indoor Chopper!
customer_reviews.text: This is a FUN little indoor chopper! We had a similar model before, but this one has a “hold” feature on altitude that makes it even easier to fly, as well as convenient when handing the controller to someone else. The old one would fall out of the sky when letting off of the altitude control. The battery runtime is very good! Hubby and I traded off a couple of times, pretty sure we were well past 5 minutes. Our rule: when you crash, you let the other pilot take over. 😄 Again, great little helicopter to fly indoors, to entertain cats and dogs, and put a smile on human faces, too!
customer_reviews.author: "Laurie, not Lori"

customer_reviews.title: Fun, easy and forgiving...
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy this S107H-E ...one button take off and landing, but you can also slow it down and land with throttle, then advance the throttle for gentle lift off. Very easy/quick learning curve. A low and slow fly-by :-) ... A lot of fun !
customer_reviews.author: Jim B.

customer_reviews.title: Birthday Gift Flop
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a birthday gift for my son: it was the one thing he asked for specifically. Unfortunately as soon as we got it all set up and he tried to operate the helicopter, the remote smelled burnt and shorted out. In our rural area, returning anything to Amazon is not worth the time and expense. Basically I am out $40 and my son was gifted a defective product. It is very disappointing, because I chose this particular model/product based on the positive reviews posted here.
customer_reviews.author: seether814

customer_reviews.title: Another hit for my kids
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty cool and has a different feel/controls then the regular drone. It does hover nicely. These like anything else smaller are not able to handle strong wings outside. I tried that and ended up having it thrown like 40 feet. Great news is that this is very durable! Luckily I have a very large area at my work to use it with zero issues. Range is surprisingly good as well.
customer_reviews.author: jd picchietti

customer_reviews.title: Toy Helicopter is super easy to fly and very stable.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to fly and very stable. Had me wishing there was a video camera on board (it's that stable). Right out of the box, charged in less than an hour and after reviewing the simple instructions, I was able to fly from room to room inside my house without crashing. It is susceptible to wind outside and I did crash it outside but it did not harm to the helecopter. Handed this off to my 6 year old nephew and with simple instruction he was able to easily fly and would let me have it back! A one hour charge gets you about 5-6 minutes flight time which is quite a long time for a device so small.
customer_reviews.author: 50Bubbles

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Cool Gadget
customer_reviews.text: I love little drones and wanted to try out a helicopter. This one exceeded my expectations. First off, it arrives in a box inside of a box in styrofoam so as not to be damaged in shipping. It’s assembled and easy to take out. You just add batteries to the remote and turn it on. It pairs easily with the instructions and flies easily around the house. As it hovers, it only moves off the path a little. And can I just say the quality is fantastic. Both remote and helicopter are not cheap plastic like most products in this category. Charges great, but like drones doesn’t have the longest life. Very fun!
customer_reviews.author: McKinzi McClelland

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy for kids and adults
customer_reviews.text: The S107H Helicopter is a very exciting and easy to use RC helicopter. Straight from the box, the helicopter is charged and ready to use. The controls are very simple and easy to master. The helicopter flies very smoothly and its controls are one of a kind. Additionally, the product comes with a charger and a replacement blade along with a screwdriver to remove the battery cover for the remote. The S107H combines both innovation with simplicity to create a product that is one bang for its buck! Overall, I would recommend this to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Great copter short battery life. All ages.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4 year old nephew who was dying for a helicopter. This is an sophisticated, cool toy! My 11 year old nephew was drooling over it!! It was perfect for him too!! I bought it for the 4 year old because it has one button up and one button to land which is quite easy for him to do and he is obsessed with this sleek copter. However, it is capable of doing so much more so it is perfect for teens and adults. The downside is the battery life is only about 5 minutes. The battery is eternal so the entire helicopter must be charged.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Toy for older kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5 year old son but it ended up being my toy. My son was too young for this so I took over. :) Control is easy, range is decent. My house has a high ceiling so I can comfortably play this at home. However, if you have never owned one of these and it is your first time playing, I strongly recommen playing it outdoor so the blade does not get damaged by hitting wall and ceiling. It would be even better if it comes with a second backup battery so I don't have to wait for charging after just one play.
customer_reviews.author: Edison Jiang

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Item was defective. Sent it back. But after purchasing another helicopter in lieu of this one I can see that This is not a good helicopter for beginners. Especially little kids. They're difficult to fly and crash a lot so the best option for beginners would b one with the protective rim which circles the propellers ..bc when it crashes or hits something they don't break and it doesn't cause damage to the house Little tikes helicopter is a great one to get for smaller children or beginners
customer_reviews.author: Matt / Ash

customer_reviews.title: Fun gadget, easy to learn
customer_reviews.text: I currently own a quadcopter drone and the functions on this helicopter drone has identical functionality. It didn't take much time to learn to use this. It's ready to use right out of the box since everything is already pre-assembled. Just need to supply your own AA batteries (4 of them) for the remote. It's pretty smooth flying this around the house but it's recommended to do this in outdoors especially if you are new to this. The blades can be a bit sharp so it's best to avoid contact with it. It's a bit noisy when flying/hovering but great fun overall which lasts about 5-6 minutes before needed a charge (about an hour).
customer_reviews.author: HF

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time! DOA. Returned. Got a second one, also DOA.
customer_reviews.text: First unit I received flew twice fine, and then upon takeoff would lose altitude and land within 1 second of takeoff. Returned it. Got a second one. Same thing. Poor quality - I give up. Moving on to a better quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Sam O'Leary

customer_reviews.title: Altitude hold, 1 key take off... nice beginner's helicopter
customer_reviews.text: With 1 key take off and landing, altitude hold it is a nice helicopter for beginners. The blades fold so if you crash it does not cause damage. Emergency stop is nice feature it it goes out of sight which can happen quickly when you are learning. I would recommend flying it inside for a few initial flights until you get a hang for it.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Jekyll

customer_reviews.title: Nice buy
customer_reviews.text: I’m not new to flying, I have wrecked and ruined a much nicer electric copter before! The hover feature alone makes this easy to fly and avoid maybe half the initial learning curve. In my 75 minutes of initial flight I wrecked a lot so this sexy lil beast is also durable. Be prepared for 5-7 minutes of flight time per charge. There is an “advanced” mode that will make it go faster for those that aspire to get out of “beginner” mode.
customer_reviews.author: Loanbandit

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fly with the hover feature. Looks awesome too!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good little toy. There are lots of options in regards to these little RC helicopter drones, so I would say that what makes this one stand out is the looks and how easy it is to control. The hovering feature makes it soooo easy to maneuver around as well as the feature to land itself. I took the video with one hand and piloting with the other one, that is how easy it is to fly this thing, would recommend for young kids (as long as they are old enough to know not to fly this at peoples faces).
customer_reviews.author: C-bass

customer_reviews.title: Fun times in the house..
customer_reviews.text: This RC Helicopter is a fun little toy. It's ready to fly right out of the box. Very easy to learn too. I had it airborne in my living room in no time. Seems to be very durable as well. Crashed it in to the furniture and wall a few times with no damage. I think I had it in the air for about 5 minutes at one point with no problem. The on board battery charges quickly too. I highly recommend this one for beginners who want to have some fun indoors.
customer_reviews.author: Stewart Lind

customer_reviews.title: Cool helicopter for inside fun around the house
customer_reviews.text: This is a very easy to fly remote control helicopter that has been a lot of fun to fly inside the house. I have a much more expensive drone for my business that I am very careful with but this little helicopter I can hit walls and other things in the house and has been just fine. The battery life is surprisingly very good. My wife got the hang of flying the helicopter very quickly and she plays with it just as much as I do. I will update with pictures of it and a short clip of the helicopter flying.
customer_reviews.author: Padder

customer_reviews.title: This little helicopter is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this helicopter for my great-grandson's 6th birthday today even though it says 14+. I am not suggesting anyone else do that, but he has asked for an RC helicopter for 6 months. I thought he would wreck it because it is small and very light and that would be it. He has learned to fly it in less than 15 minutes and is now a pro at it. For such a lightweight little helicopter, this toy seems very sturdy. He loves this toy!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Amazing customer service (Indoor only helicopter)
customer_reviews.text: Don't fly outside! Sure, you can, but this heli can and will lose connection with the remote at longer distances and will proceed to yeet itself into the great beyond, never to be seen again! Luckily the seller was very understanding of my situation and replaced my helicopter with a brand new one, since mine decided to start a new life in the rocky mountains, away from city life. 10/10 customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really stable, really happy
customer_reviews.text: Really amazed how controllable and easy this is to fly. Ive only played with 4 prop drones prior and didnt think this would be as stable. I was able to make a video of it flying in my bathroom with non dominant hand and had no issues. One button take off and landing and if you do happen to hit something, its quite durable and can take a fall. Really happy playing with this. The battery lasts quite long for the small size.
customer_reviews.author: Mihai

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little helicopter
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little helicopter and very sturdy. My kid really enjoys playing with it. One key takeoff and landing makes it very easy to handle it. Good enough charge time for its size. Not just for indoor....i use it in my backyard. Does really well even in slight winds, but wont recommend in heavy winds....it would drift away. It would be better if they can include a spare tail rotor blade and pair of extra blades...incase they break.
customer_reviews.author: Kiran B

customer_reviews.title: A good gift
customer_reviews.text: I got the product. I didn't like the idea that it only had a USB plug rather than usb to elec. Once it was charged up it was fairly easy to play with it. I thought the controls would have batteries but I had to purchase batteries. The controls were easy to maneuver. It flew nicely but when it got close to the wall it fell. Didn't break. Was able to start it back up again. My grand kids(under 14) played with it, and said they wanted one for Christmas. I guess that's what they will get.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Clark

customer_reviews.title: great cheap coax for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: disclaimer: I received this product for fre from SYMA for testing purposes. A great indoor coax for beginners! Just make sure to close windows and turn off any fans before flying this since there are no IMU/gyroscopes to compensate for winds. that being said, this coax is very steady if flown with no wind condition, great for beginners! after crashing this coax while trying to fly it near a fan, none of the part seemed to be broken and was flying fine. overall, excellent toy/helicopter for $30.
customer_reviews.author: Kopa

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying
customer_reviews.text: This is nice remote control helicopter if you enjoy this hobby. The control is very responsive and makes it easier to fly, not so touchy that it takes off with every little adjustment. Perfect for indoor or outdoor but you can't go too far til it would lose reception. I got this for my 7 year old son. It can ensure quite a bit of dropping before it breaks a piece. It is not made cheap like I've had one before.
customer_reviews.author: Troyerd

customer_reviews.title: Wrong charger
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I was extremely disappointed about was the one helicopter came with the right charger. The other came with what looked like a phone charger. The kids were excited to test them, but the one had to wait I bought both of my nephews this and they just loved them. The helicopters were easy to learn for a 5 and 9 year old. They move steady. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a gift to give.
customer_reviews.author: Jj

customer_reviews.title: Fun right of the box
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty fun to play with right out of the box. My husband recently got a drone and my five year old son wanted something similar so they could fly them together. This is perfect for that. It obviously doesn't go as high or far as the drone but it gives my son the feeling that he's doing something like Daddy. It's also pretty durable, we (I) bumped it into the ceiling a couple of times and it was fine. Even though the run-time is only about five minutes, It charges pretty quickly. I received this item in exchange for an honest review. Having reviewed it, I would absolutely purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: Naturalchick

customer_reviews.title: Great Improvement
customer_reviews.text: I bought an S107 a few years ago, just out of curiosity. It worked quite well (& still does), but it just used it indoors to have fun around the house. This new model has a greatly improved controller that uses RF rather than infrared, so you can theoretically fly outside, I wouldn't recommend though, since it still is very subject to any slight gust of wind.. Overall I like this new version very much.
customer_reviews.author: Kailua Haole

customer_reviews.title: My kids and the adult love it
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginner, this S107H helicopter is good for me and it is very easy to operate with the controller. The parts can be replaced, but I don’t know where to order the parts. And it has many YouTube videos for this helicopter if you needed help and just search with "S197H" at YouTube. I like it that it was came with a screwdriver to make you easier to replace the 4 x AA batteries for the controller and it is child safety also. The size is good for indoor and outdoor. My kids and the adult love it, I recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: A perfect first remote controlled helicopter
customer_reviews.text: With its default setting set to very gentle, it is was easy for my kid to grap the behavior of aircraft. Quickly he turned it into challenges: let's do a rescue mission on the platform! The autolanding feature works very well. When it gets stuck or hit something there is an auto shut off that is fairly sensitive. I would not try to fly it outside as it is set pretty conservatively.
customer_reviews.author: gbin

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE FOR A PARTY!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this little helicopter for a birthday party for our preteen niece and did not expect much based on the price. We were pleasantly surprised when this toy captured the attention of both children and adults at our gathering. Everyone wanted a turn and was able to easily operate it. The unit is light, highly maneuverable and has very realistic flight pattern! We and our guests enjoyed it and recommend it to others looking for a realistic helicopter done.
customer_reviews.author: Alana Smith

customer_reviews.title: Easy-Breezy fun in the air!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best one yet! Within minutes of assuring the helicopter was fully charged, my grandson and I had it flying within 3 minutes. We walked it around our entire Loft (3,600 SF) who's 13' ceilings made it a most opportune testing ground. It has an auto-return button, it hovers easily, turns goes backward, dives,...we had great fun for almost 30 minutes I think. This is THEEEE helicopter to have immediate fun with!!
customer_reviews.author: Alan D Chasan

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginner!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice drone. It’s small and very light weight. If there any wind at all it will take off since it’s so light. I’ve never used a drone before but for the most part this was easy enough to figure out. It has automatic take off but be careful because the throttle is at half way all the time so it picks up and goes immediately. I do wish there was a manual takeoff option. It charges quick and lasts quite a while on one charge. All in all good for a beginner!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica H

customer_reviews.title: Great Beginner
customer_reviews.text: Fun drone for a beginner. Easy to use and the directions are very nice. Takeoff and landing with push of a button. Control sticks are easy to use. Speed is not too crazy. It is forgiving with hitting objects (see my landing). I had fun with it and i think my kids will too. Would recommend to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Harshman Hills

customer_reviews.title: Excellent starter drone at a super price
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cool drone for the price. It’s very easy to fly and has great maneuverability. I can easily fly it around inside the house. This is definitely a great starter drone for a beginner or children. The LED lights make it really easy to see and clearly show when the unit is turned on so you won’t accidentally leave it on and run the batteries down.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Ihnen

customer_reviews.title: Great for a young beginner. Adults will get bored quick.
customer_reviews.text: This little copter works great and doesn't take long to charge. Unfortunately it's a very beginner helicopter and is extremely slow. For the same price you can find others that have some zip to them. My 5 year old mastered it in minutes. I bought it on impulse because I had wrecked another to the point of not being fixable hoping this would take its place. It's just really really slow.
customer_reviews.author: JohnMichaelJames

customer_reviews.title: Wont hover
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping that this would work better than the infrared controller types. It almost seems like it really is infrared the lag in the controls is just as bad. But this one was even worse because it was impossible to get it to hover in one place no matter how you adjusted the controller. It is pretty tough because I crashed it several times with no visible damage. I thought I would give it a try since it was on sale but sent it back. It is mostly unflyable.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Easy navigating
customer_reviews.text: This helicopter is a great starting point for beginners looking to learn to navigate remote control drones. It is very stable and easily steered as compared to other remote drones I have tried. It is very petite but sturdy and my son loves steering the toggles as well as chasing it around the room. I love how the battery doesn’t need to be removed to charge... The charger plugs right into the helicopter.
customer_reviews.author: Jjlen

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice remote control helicopter, it is great for beginners such as myself. It's small enough to fly in the house, and easy to control. The blades are not fixed,. So if you do hit something, it reduces the damage to the helicopter. I love this, my new favorite toy. It comes with a USB charger for the helicopter itself and the remote control needs 4-AA batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Nancyb1167

customer_reviews.title: It holds altitude!
customer_reviews.text: Let me start with when I reached out to the seller with questions regarding this helicopter I received answers really fast. Customer service was a 10 out of 10! It was a no brainer to order this. The minute I saw the packaging I realized this is no cheapy helicopter! It's made of great quality material, and the best part is how stable it is! Top left button is used for auto take off and auto landing making it super easy to fly! I will definitely purchase more as gifts for the family. Don't forget it needs 4 AA batteries!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Even adults will enjoy
customer_reviews.text: Read ALL instructions before first use AND charge the battery GOOD: - Easy to learn and use - Instructions are well written - Good value for beginners and indoor play BAD: - Had to return the first item that arrived since it had a broken stabilizer rotor and was just spinning
customer_reviews.author: WINNER not whiner

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to fly and lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: This is a really easy to fly helicopter, it is very stable and works great for beginners. My 8 year old andc11 tear old son , both love to fly it. The remote is easy to use and the range is great. I would totally recommend it especially since the price is so low. The only bad point is the low fly time because the battery doesn't last very long but that is to be expected with this type of copter.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Great STARTER drone / helicopter
customer_reviews.text: Your kids are going to love this. It is a bit sturdier option for your kids to learn how to control remote drones. The helicopter is well built and sturdy. Obviously it is going to take a few tumbles and you don't have to worry it won't work. The remote is easy to use and the helicopter is very responsive
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Jen

customer_reviews.title: An easy and fun to fly copter for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box this is a super easy little copter. I found the instructions to be easy to understand and follow. This copter is very stable so flying it is very easy. I excepted to have to work the controls a lot more. To the contrary, one it is flying I could hand the controls to anyone and they knew what to do with ease, Battery time was a little better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Larry F.

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use. Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This helicopter is really fun to fly with ease. Very easy to charge and start flying. The controls are very simple and the lights on the helicopter are awesome. I would highly recommend this helicopter for anyone who wants to start flying and immediately having fun. This helicopter even has an emergency stop button to quickly land.
customer_reviews.author: Katnik Family

customer_reviews.title: Great cheap fun
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. Indoors only though. Any fan, or wind and it's off and running. But in still air, it is a blast, and not difficult to control. My 5 yr old granddaughter is not bad with it. Durable enough, several "crashes" and still flying like new.
customer_reviews.author: MichMan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this helicopter. I thought it would be hard to learn how to fly it but it was so easy! It glides beautifully and stays stable while flying. My kids love it and it entertains them for a very long time. I recommend adding it to your kids’ toy collection.
customer_reviews.author: MiamiLadyLiving

customer_reviews.title: Fun to fly
customer_reviews.text: I have several drones but this is my first helicopter. I find it is very much fun to fly indoors. I have 2 yorkies and its a blast to hover above them about 6 inches. They bark and growl at it. It has beginner mode and expert mode. The flashing LEDs are really cool too. It takes about an hour to charge for 10 minutes of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Art B

customer_reviews.title: ready right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Pros- Flies great, accurate, auto land and take off is remarkable. flight control is very simple. quality build. I highly recommend this for anyone looking for an RC helicopter for their child. my 8year old and 5 year old.. love its can't wait for each recharge. Con flight time is a bit short because its sooooooo fun 7-minutes
customer_reviews.author: EvenKeel

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners due to its ease of the controls
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many drones and one thing that always gets me is that there always seems to be a steep learning curve when it comes to manning the controls. Surprisingly, this was not a problem at all with this copter. It was very easy to pick up and just go. The battery life is also respectable among the small drone class. Overall, just for its ease of use I think it makes a very nice gift for a young teen who is in to aviation.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Canales

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy to learn, very stable flight
customer_reviews.text: This is the best first-time RC Helicopter anyone can buy. It is solid and mostly metal, hope it lasts for a long time. It is very stable, you just increase the throttle to takeoff for a stable hover. Recharges very fast and flies for about 10 minutes. I had a lot of fun with my 2 years old toddler, she just tries to catch it as I fly it around. It has very sensitive controls, you can easily maneuver and have fun. Only downside is that it doesn't come with a AA battery for the remote, but I honestly do not care as I always have a 100-pack around.
customer_reviews.author: Senthur

customer_reviews.title: Fun to fly!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun. My kids were even able to fly it with a little bit of practice. Much easier than the helicopter I had 5 years ago. This one is a lot better. I wish the battery life was better so we could fly it longer. But I understand that the battery has to be small to fit in the helicopter. Still a great value!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing quality toy. Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing helicopter. Hobby quality-made to last. This one will give hours of fun. Dont be fooled by cheaper versions. Solid metal light weight frame allows precision flying. Better buy 2 if your giving it to your child, you will want your own.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Small and very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This little helicopter is great for beginners. Very easy to learn and is built well. so minor crashes will not damage the helicopter. Indoor only. Outdoors, even the slightest breeze makes it difficult to fly. auto takeoff and auto landing is definitely good for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Awesome RC Helicopter
customer_reviews.text: Items received as stated. As a beginner there is a learning curve. Maybe for a younger person with video or gaming skills the learning curve wouldn't be as much. It is a lot of fun. The instructions stated 5 minutes flying time but i enjoyed more than 5 minutes. Recommend this RC helicopter to make one happy pilot!
customer_reviews.author: Jerelyn

customer_reviews.title: Great for young kids
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old loves it. I have my own helicopter but he cannot control that one. This helicopter stays by itself in the air so the kids needs to control sideways or forward/backwards. It will be nice for the manufacturer to upgrade this to a battery that would last 10.
customer_reviews.author: Ionut Manta

customer_reviews.title: Cool piece of tech
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool piece I really like the light on it and it means I can use it in the dark and it works really well the controls are not the easiest but they're not that hard either they're just not the easiest control but the helicopter flies pretty well and hovers pretty well I'm not a professional but I really did enjoy it
customer_reviews.author: C.Aber

customer_reviews.title: Fun to play with :-)
customer_reviews.text: This is amazingly fun for a grown up kid like me! Well made apparently, took some beating while I was getting used to the control, even fell off of my 3rd floor balcony once. Still going strong! The control is quite intuitive, the user manual is easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: suhridkhan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great for beginners. My 7 year old begged me to get him a helicopter for Christmas. My experience with cheap Helicopters has been... they're uncontrollable and they break the first few days. After reading lots of reviews I finally took a chance and got this one. This thing is super easy and flies very controlled. It's slow but for some fun and practice this thing is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: cuban467

customer_reviews.title: Lot's of fun, even for old geezers.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good beginning helicopter for say 13-14 year olds or just to have something easy to fly in-doors. My cats are alternately perplexed and very interested, so there's that as a benefit as well. Definitely recommended for anyone starting out or just looking for a way to while away an afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: Tod Stiles

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and awesome to fly.
customer_reviews.text: Looks awesome and is very easy to control. Very well built as well. The only drawback is that they don’t ship a few replacement blades with it. They sent a second tail rotor but no main rotors. I have to assume you can buy them somewhere so until then I guess I can’t crash it.
customer_reviews.author: Primalfear

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! 😊 I’m addicted to flying it but it took awhile for me to adjust to learning how to fly it. And I play video games on the regular. It doesn’t seem the material isn’t well made like it might break at any moment. I wish the helicopter had better material.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Godfrey

customer_reviews.title: Will not fly forward. Just hovers.
customer_reviews.text: Helicopter will not fly forward. It goes up and down and can turn. When nothing is pressed or controlled it auto flys backwards. So it all it does is go up and down and hover, then no, this is not a good product.
customer_reviews.author: E. Wyk

customer_reviews.title: So easy to fly
customer_reviews.text: I have had similar helicopters in the past that were very difficult to fly and that really takes away from the fun. This model is so easy because it holds position until you move it. I have been having a blast with it and my kids from age 4-10 have been able to fly it as well. We have crashed it a few times and so far it is holding up just fine with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: LJM

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: I’m impressed at the quality of this little helicopter. My little nephew loved it and even the adults at his birthday wanted to take a turn flying it. The battery has lasted well and my nephew has dropped it a couple of times but it hasn’t endured any damage. I’m very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew. He charged it up over night and when he tried to use it it only flew for 5 minutes. He tried everything to get it to work. He called customer service and they had him email product information. They never responded to his email. I’m returning it back to Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Francisca Araiza

customer_reviews.title: Fun beginner play drone toy
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice little toy. It was easy to follow the instruction until it forgot to mention to make it start flying, you need to press the button on left too (of the front side). Once it starts flying it was easy to manipulate and move around. Definitely a fun thing to do with kids.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Wu

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first helicopter and it looks great! It comes with clear instructions on how to use start it and how to use the remote. It's small but sturdy. I attached a picture of the helicopter by a regular remote for size comparison. Note: batteries are not included.
customer_reviews.author: ITF

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Flying right out of the box with very little learning curve. Very easy to control. Only complaint is the short flying time between charges, but I was aware of this when I bought it so that doesn't take away from my rating.
customer_reviews.author: Music Lover

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Can't charge it. Blamed the Grinch. Ordered another. Hopefully I can give more stars when the new one arrives.
customer_reviews.author: Wade

customer_reviews.title: For Indoor Use
customer_reviews.text: FOR INDOOR USE! This is a great helicopter especially for beginners. My 8 year old learned to fly this helicopter very easily. On the flip side unfortunately in order to fly outdoors, there has to be 0 WIND outside. Just 1 MILES PER HOUR OF WIND will blow this helicopter away and make it hard to control. With that being said, I hope this review helps other dads out there.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Edmond

customer_reviews.title: Great family fun
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to try the helicopter before my kids. In my excitement I flew the helicopter into my hair. Both my hair and the helicopter survived. It is easy to use and the kids love flying it. The only con is the battery life is short.
customer_reviews.author: Conweis

customer_reviews.title: Landfill fodder piece of garbage.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased two. The first one had a bad rotor within two uses and no major crashes. The second has some kind of battery issue where it won’t hold a charge. Horrible product. Don’t waste your time or money. Both are headed to a landfill. Sad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worse than the cheaper one
customer_reviews.text: This one is trash compared to the one they sell that doesn’t have the “one touch” take off and all that BS. This thing is way less fun and gives you less control than the cheaper one.
customer_reviews.author: TLP

customer_reviews.title: Very stable flight controls
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool!! The hover feature is amazing. The thing seriously just floats in the air not moving if you want it too. My nephew was a little better at figuring out the controls than I was though lol. He tied a message to it and was able to fly it upstairs to my room, telling me it was time to cook them lunch haha...
customer_reviews.author: JKolo

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so my youngest could fly around things while I broke out my more expensive drone. It is pretty easy to use and the kids love it. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: Great starter helicopter
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son has a birthday present, as soon as he charged it he was flying it with ease. He has never had a remote helicopter before, and is able to navigate the house within minutes. The helicopter also is very tough as he fluid towards my older son who whacked it out of the air into the wall onto the floor, it was picked up and flying again in seconds. I strongly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J Gorman

customer_reviews.title: Best gift for first time users
customer_reviews.text: This helicopter runs so smoothly. It is very easy to maneuver without previous experience. Definitely learn how to use it a lot faster than the drone. Safe for children with supervision.
customer_reviews.author: Jose N.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy design and easy to control.
customer_reviews.text: Its easy to use, specially for kids and its sturdy. I did test trying to see if it fails to return but i guess this is a winner and it is ready to play out of the box RC helicopter.
customer_reviews.author: jairam munuparthi

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: Junk, first one worked for three battery charges and went full throttle, uncontrollable and DANGEROUS! Save your $$$. BTW, I am being propositioned by the seller to take my review down in return they will send me a $25 Amazon gift card. So instead of acknowledging and fixing a problem they are trying to hide it!!
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Very fun to play with and Stable!
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to use and one of the best to control. The home key o land it was spot on. I did crash it a few times but it didn't hurt it at all. Would highly recommend and stays in the air a long time before needing to be charged. I know you will enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: L.D.

customer_reviews.title: Very surprising and nimble
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting much for this price, but it is easily the best RC copter I have seen or owned. Very precise, more for indoor use as breezes will blow it off course
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginner
customer_reviews.text: This is a great helicopter with great features for the price. Kids learned how to control it within minutes. The auto take off and auto land feature is great.
customer_reviews.author: Luis M.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun in a small package
customer_reviews.text: Fun little remote control helicopter. It is small. I included a picture to see in reference to my hand. But it is fun because you can easily take it with you and fly it diffrent places which has been fun.
customer_reviews.author: LYCOUNRTYGIRL

customer_reviews.title: Easy Flying & Fun
customer_reviews.text: Well crafted and durable RC Helicopter for a low price. It's very easy to fly and entertaining for the duration of the 5 minute battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Ron F.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Helicopter
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to my son the first one came damaged due to the amazon shipping handling but the seller and amazon were quick to get me another one. It work right out of the box and my son loves it. would strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Steady and Swift
customer_reviews.text: This helicopter is lightweight yet sturdy. It flies accurately. I am by no means skilled in electronics but I was able to get the hang of flying this helicopter within a fairly short time. It’s a great excuse to get outdoors. Best used on less windy days as it is light. Has continued to work great though multiple crashes. Overall, enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: TXKakes23

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy.
customer_reviews.text: Fun to play with and easy to learn. Remote is simple but works well. I like that it can hover in place. Excellent product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: A. Matos

customer_reviews.title: Good product for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my kid very easy to use and manage it stabilizes itself my 9 year old and 11 year old play with the helicopter a lot!good battery time like 15 minutes I recommended
customer_reviews.author: Fadi

customer_reviews.title: unsure of its safety
customer_reviews.text: i did not like the cautions on this toy and did not feel it safe for my grandchild
customer_reviews.author: Helen Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Anyone see a helicopter ?
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoyed this for 2 days than I brought it outdoors and bye bye it flew away unresponsive to commands. Anyone need a remote ?
customer_reviews.author: Don Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Fun RC flier for a good price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve flown about half a dozen different copters (heli & quad). This one is a little tricky to learn, but once you get the hang of it, it’s a lot of fun! No complaints, just know there’s a bit of a learning curve to it. Charges quickly & good to take out if you’ve got 10 min to kill.
customer_reviews.author: boogsley

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner helicopter drone
customer_reviews.text: The helicopter has a good build quality. But what stands out is that it is easy and stable to fly. Other helicopter drones were relatively much harder to control. Even with a slight nudge on their remote stick, they would go crazy and ultimately crash. Not this one. You should be able to start and enjoying flying in only a couple of minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Adnan Hussain

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: All of my grandkids loved this toy and had so much fun with it. However, their father loved it the best and truly adult supervision was required.
customer_reviews.author: mct

customer_reviews.title: Great learner flyer
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up out of the box -- 5 minutes we were flying! We did have some issues with trim/drift but the adjustments helped to alleviate that. Definitely a fun toy! My 5 y/o was able to fly with ease & the unit did not get damaged from hitting into trees.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Dickmann

customer_reviews.title: Tons of fun for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to operate and my kids love it!!! Also, battery life is very good. Please watch the video to see how to operate it. Definitely would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: odecca1980

product_meta.title: Remote Control Helicopter, S107H-E Aircraft with Altitude Hold, One Key take Off/Landing, 3.5 Channel, Gyro Stabilizer and High &Low Speed, LED Light for Indoor to Fly for Kids and Beginners(Red)
feature_bullets: 【Altitude Hold Function】Compared with other helicopters,SYMA S107H-R with this function but most of others without this function.it be locked at a certain height when you release the throttle stick, which makes it easier to control the helicopter for beginner and kids.
【One Key Take Off/Landing】with these functions,The helicopter will hover at certain altitude automatically after taking off/landing.it is easy to operate for kids and beginers.

【Whole Alloy body&Anti-Collision】Whole alloy material weight 0.97LB is very sturdy with longer lifespan, which is suit for kids and beginner to play as no serious damage or dysfunctional appearance after many times crashes.

【Full 3.5 Channels & 2 Selectable Frequencies】Up, Down, Left, Right, Forward and Backward built-in Gyro to hover in the air.Moves More Flexible and Stable.2 Selectable Frequencies Let You Fly Up To 2 Helicopters At Once.
【[Helicopter with several certificates】FCC, CE, ROHS, EN71, EN62115, EN60825, R&TTE, PAHS, HR4040, 6P, ASTM,REACH. Compatible with US standard. It is very safety for kids playing.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars591 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
